segments.text: Bill , do you know when did the Chinese begin to celebrate Teachers ' Day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know the Chinese teachers had their first festival in 1985 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , it is the 27th Teachers ' Day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What will you do on Teachers ' Day ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am going to send Mr . Li some flowers . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I intend to invite him to dinner .
segments.speaker: S2
